rules.title: Heavy Armoured Vehicle (H-AV)
description: Units with the unit type H-AV can take zwei damage before they are killed, und counts as zwei units für Outnumber, Blast Markers, number of attacks in an assault, hit allocation und the maximum number of units in base contact. H-AV are treated as WE when hit by weapons that do multiple Punkte of damage (e.g. TK(D3)). In addition it is possible to critically hit H-AVs. If a Critical Hit is rolled, the unit is destroyed with no further effects. H-AVs may be targeted by Pin-Point attacks, but does not target individual models. Instead, hits are randomized in the formation. H-AVs are treated like normal Armoured Vehicles in all other respects.

rules.title: Machine Spirit
description: A formation that exclusively consists of units with Machine Spirit may only perform the Hold, Engage, Marshal, Sustained Fire und Overwatch actions. In addition, such formations may only contest objectives, und always counts as being within 30cm of an enemy formation when attempting to Rally.

rules.title: Deflektorschilde
description: Jeweils void shield will automatically stop eine point of damage und then go down. Do not make armour saves für damage stopped by Deflektorschilde, nor allocate Blast markers. Once all of the shields have been knocked down, the War Engine may be damaged normally und you may make saving throws against any hits that are scored. Hits from close combat ignore Deflektorschilde but units using their firefight values must first knock down any shields before they can damage the Titan.
Deflektorschilde that have been knocked down can be repaired. Jeweils War Engine can repair eine downed Void Shield in the End Phase of jeweils turn.

In addition, if a War Engine regroups (either by performing a Hold oder a Marshal action) it can use the dice roll both to repair Deflektorschilde und remove Blast Markers. However, only half the Punkte generated (fractions rounded up) may be spent on restoring Deflektorschilde (e.g. if you rolled a 3 you could remove drei Blast Markers, oder repair zwei Deflektorschilde und remove eine Blast Marker).

rules.title: Gottgleiche Maschine
description: War Engines with 8 oder more DC are subject to the Gottgleiche Maschine und Feuer aufteilen special rules.

The magnificence of these awe-Inspirierend constructs comes at a price, für if such an incarnation of power were to falter oder be destroyed, the Streitmächte that are there to aid them would become greatly disturbed.

Für this reason, whenever a unit with Gottgleiche Maschine special rule is broken (including if it is already broken but loses an Engage), all friendly formations suffer eine Blast Marker. Whenever a unit with Gottgleiche Maschine special rule is destroyed, all friendly formations on the battlefield suffer D3 Blast Markers.
Units with the Gottgleiche Maschine special rule are themselves immune to this effect.

rules.title: Feuer aufteilen
description: A War Engine with this special rule may declare that it will Feuer aufteilen when attempting to perform a Sustain Fire oder Advance action, suffering a -1 modifier on the roll. If the action is successful, the WE may fire at bis zu zwei enemy formations, but may not target more than eine formation pro individual weapon.

rules.title: Stomp ’em Good
description: A War Engine with this special rule may declare that it will Feuer aufteilen when attempting to perform a Sustain Fire action, suffering a -1 modifier on the roll. Regardless if the action succeeds oder if the formation is forced to Hold, the WE may fire at bis zu zwei enemy formations, but may not target more than eine formation pro individual weapon.

rules.title: Adeptus Custodians
description: Adeptus Custodian are renowned für their tenacity und bravery. This is represented by the following rules:
* It takes 2 Blast Markers to suppress a Adeptus Custodian unit.
* Adeptus Custodian formations are only broken if they have 2 Blast Markers pro unit in the formation.

* Adeptus Custodian formations only count half their number of Blaster markers in assault resolution (rounding down—note that assault resolution will not receive +1 für having no Blast Markers if the formation has 1 Blast Marker before rounding down).

* When a broken Adeptus Custodian formation rallies, it receives a number of Blast Markers equal to the number of units, rather than half this number. Adeptus Custodians with the Anführer special ability remove 2 Blast Markers instead of 1

* All Adeptus Custodian units are consider Furchtlos in all respects except they still have to end their move while broken outside of 15cm of an enemy foramtion. If they cant they are subject to standard hackdowns rules für broken non Furchtlos units with in 15cm of a enemy unit taking into account the above rules für Adeptus Custodians und Blast Markers.

rules.title: Support Craft
description: Support Craft are Skimmers, which für all line of sight und terrain purposes Zählt als ‘popped up’ at all times. If the Support Craft has a transport option, it may embark und disembark units as normal. Embarked units are allowed a save (see 1.7.5) if the Support Craft is destroyed.

Support Craft do not block line of sight, must always use their Antigrav ability to force a firefight in engagements und Infanterie in base contact mit einemSupport Craft may not use it to Zählt als being in cover.

rules.title: Spirit Lords
description: A formation mit einemLiving Ancestor does not suffer a -1 modifier to their Action Test when attempting to retain the initiative.

rules.title: Tunneling Transports
description: Formations including units with both the Transport und Tunneler special rules must start the game in the reserves, und may only enter the battlefield through tunneling. War Engines with these special rules may not start the game empty, but must transport another formation.

rules.title: Shield Disruptor
description: Jeweils point of damage from a hit with Shield Disruptor will knock down zwei Powerfields, Shadowfields oder Deflektorschilde (if only eine remains it is knocked down, but the hit does not carry over). In addition, Shield Disruptor hits ignores Deflector Shields und Ion Shields.

rules.title: Bravery
description: All Knight formations receive a +1 modifier to their Action Test when carrying out an Engage, und a +1 modifier to their Rally Tests.

rules.title: Chivalry
description: All Knight formations receive a +1 modifier to their Action Test when carrying out an Engage oder Double action, und a +1 modifier to their Rally Tests.

rules.title: Stubborn
description: Any formation where at least eine unit has Stubborn reduce the damage caused by Blast Markers while the formation is broken by eine, reduce the number of extra hits from losing an assault by eine, requires einen zusätzlichen Blast Marker before the formation becomes broken, und may ignore eine Blast Marker when determining suppression.

rules.title: Ion Shield (x)
description: Knights make use of Ion Shields to deflect shooting und firefight attacks. This allows them to make a saving throw on the number within brackets when they are hit by ranged fire instead of using their armour value.

No modifiers ever apply to this saving throw und it is unaffected by Macro-Weapon, Lanze und Titan Killer hits (jeweils point of damage from a Titan Killer hit must be saved separately. Is affected normally by hits with the Disrupt special rule). If the unit has Verstärkte Panzerung as well then it is allowed to re-roll a failed save using its armour value unless the hit was a Macro-Weapon, Lanze oder Titan killer.

Ion Shields may only be used against shooting unless the unit is in a Crossfire, und against FF unless the hit is caused by a unit in support. They may not be used against CC attacks. If relevant, roll CC und FF dice separately when attacking units equipped with Ion Shields.

rules.title: Ionic Flare Shield
description: Knights with 'Ionic Flare Shield' may also use their Ion Shield against CC attacks.

rules.title: Schildbohrer
description: Weapons with the 'Schildbohrer' special rule ignores Deflector Shields, Ion Shields, Powerfields, Shadowfields und Deflektorschilde (Shadowfields still provide cover from shooting).

rules.title: Psybolts
description: Weapons with the 'Psybolts' special rule ignores Powerfields, Shadowfields, Deflektorschilde, Deflector Shields, Ion Shields und Invulnerable Saves (Shadowfields still provide cover from shooting).

rules.title: Lightning Charge
description: Weapon oder Unit gains First Strike during engages initiated by the formation.

rules.title: Unstable
description: If a natural 1 is rolled when rolling to hit, roll another dice. If the result is yet another natural 1, the wielder is destroyed.

rules.title: Mut, Disziplin und Loyalität
description: When the Oberbefehlshaber re-roll is used on a formation that contains a Kommissar oder a Ministorum Priest, the formation counts as having 1+ Initiative Rating when re-rolling the Action Test.

rules.title: Grim Demeanour
description: Valhallan formations that contain a Ministorum Priest gain +1 on their Action Test when attempting to Marshal.

rules.title: Gravschirme
description: Units with the Gravschirme special rule may disembark within 10cm of a Antigrav transport vehicles instead of the normal 5cm.

rules.title: Ethereal
description: All units in a formation joined by an Ethereal gain Furchtlos. When the unit with the Ethereal is killed the formation loses Furchtlos und receives 1D3 Blast Markers.

rules.title: Catachan Befehlshabers
description: When the Oberbefehlshaber re-roll is used on any formation containing a Catachanischer Oberbefehlshaber oder Catachan Befehlshaber, the formation counts as having 1+ Initiative Rating when re-rolling the Action Test

rules.title: Fortified Positions
description: Fortified Positions are set up at the same time as the formation they are bought with. Units from such formations must be set up within the fortified positions, so that no space is left empty. All pieces of fortified positions must be within 5cm from another piece. Once set up, Fortified Positions counts as terrain that do not block Line of Sight, und may be used by either side. Units of INF that benefit from Cover inside a Fortified Position may only be Barged by WE in such a way that they are not moved outside of their Fortified Position.
Gun Emplacement: Provides a Cover Save of 4+ eine unit of INF, oder a 5+ Cover Save to eine unit of AV oder LV (but not H-AV).
Bunker: Provides a Cover Save of 3+ und Verstärkte Heckpanzerung to bis zu drei units of INF. Counts as Dangerous Terrain für AV und WE. Bunkers can be a maximum of 8cm x 8cm in size.
Trench: Provides a cover save of 4+ to INF. May contain eine unit of INF pro 4cm of lenght. Counts as Dangerous Terrain für AV.

Razor Wire: Counts as Dangerous Terrain für all INF, including those that have the Beritten special rule. Razor Wire dangerous terrain tests may not be re-rolled using the Geländegängig ability (units may still 'move carefully' through such terrain). Razor Wire must be set up so that every piece touches another piece from the same group, with no gap in between.

Minefields: Counts as Dangerous Terrain für all types of units. Minefield dangerous terrain tests may not be re-rolled using the Geländegängig ability (units may still 'move carefully' through such terrain). Skimmers und units with 'Sprungmodule' moving over Minefields must also take dangerous terrain tests. Minefields must be set up so that every piece touches another piece from the same group, with no gap in between.

rules.title: Baran Regiments HQ
description: When playing Epic tournament games, a Siegemaster army must include a Regiments HQ. The enemy counts as having achieved the “Break Their Spirit” goal by destroying this formation oder by destroying the most expensive formation in the army (see Victory Conditions).

rules.title: Air Superiority
description: Elysianische Sturmtruppen may ignore eine blast marker when rolling to activate aircraft formations.

In addition, Elysianische Sturmtruppen may instead of starting with garrisons on overwatch place aircrafts on Combat Air Patrol.  Bis zu zwei formations may start on overwatch oder CAP. Aircraft formation placed on CAP in this way will follow all the normal rules für CAP, but are setup during the pre-game garrisoning phase.

rules.title: Deep Strike
description: An Elysianische Sturmtruppen army that includes a Spacecraft may deploy formations transported in Valkyries, Vendettas oder Sky Talons in the Spacecraft. A Lunar-Klasse Kreuzer can hold eine formation, und a Imperator-Klasse Schlachtschiff bis zu zwei formations. All transport vehicles in a formation deployed in a Spacecraft gains the Planetfall special rule. Roll für scatter individually für jeweils transport vehicle.
Before jeweils game, after the opposing army is known but before objectives are placed, the Imperial Guard player may choose which formation(s), if any, that should be deployed in the Spaceship.

rules.title: Siege Specialists
description: Units may re-roll failed dangerous terrain tests when making a move through Minefields oder Razor Wire on the friendly part of the table, und units with Geländegängig may use it against Minefields oder Razor Wire on the enemy part of the table.
In addition, bis zu drei formations that garrison may start on Overwatch instead of the usual zwei.

rules.title: Siegemasters
description: Units may re-roll failed dangerous terrain tests when making a move through Minefields oder Razor Wire on the friendly part of the table, und units with 'Geländegängig' may use it against Minefields oder Razor Wire on the enemy part of the table.

In addition, bis zu drei formations that garrison may start on Overwatch instead of the usual zwei, und bis zu zwei formations that garrison ignore the requirement to have eine unit within 15cm of an objective on the friendly half of the table.

rules.title: Tunnelers
description: Tunnellers may be set up touching their own side's table edge before the battle starts at the same time that spacecraft are set up (see 4.3.1). Any units transported in tunnellers should be placed to eine side at this time too. Secretly write down the location where the tunneller will surface at the same time und in the same manner that you record the coordinates of a drop zone (see 4.3.1). You must also secretly record the turn the tunneller will surface. If it is going to surface within 30cm of a table edge within the deployment zone, it may arrive from the first turn. If it is going to surface within 65cm of a table edge within the deployment zone, it may appear on turn zwei. It can appear on any part of the battlefield from the third turn.

Set up the tunneller units at the start of the stated turn, before determining who wins the strategy roll, at the location you wrote down. Surfacing does not Zählt als movement für the purposes of triggering enemy overwatch fire. If a tunneller would have surfaced on terrain that is impassable für it, under a friendly unit, oder in an enemy zone of control, then it is assumed that on-board sensor equipment would divert it towards another entry point. The unit should be moved to the nearest area where it can surface.

Formations of multiple tunnellers need only record eine location where they will surface. Place the first tunneller unit at this location. All other tunneller units must be placed within 5cm of another tunneller unit that has already been placed und fully within a 15cm radius of the original surfacing coordinates, which can be beyond where tunnellers could appear that turn. Tunnelers do not have to roll für dangerous oder difficult terrain when they appear. After all tunnellers have been placed any units being transported are allowed to disembark immediately, und may disembark on the enemy half of the table (if they appear in turn 2).
Disembarking triggers overwatch fire as normal. Tunnellers, und any units being transported in them, may take an action on the turn they appear.

rules.title: Self Planetfall
description: Self Planetfall is plotted exactly as planetfall (see 4.4). Both the turn in which the formation arrives und the landing location is plotted. The only exception is that, because these units are much smaller than orbiting spacecraft, they may be plotted to arrive in the same turn that another spacecraft is present. On the designated turn the formation conducting Self Planetfall is activated in the normal activation sequence, as with spacecraft. Nominate the action für the formation und roll to activate. If the formation fails to activate its arrival is delayed to the next following turn. If the activation is successful, place the formation at the plotted landing zone und determine scatter according to 4.4 as if it were a normal planetfall, including loaded units disembarking bis zu 5cm. The formation’s action proceeds as normal in all respects from that point. In other words, the formation gets the “free move” from planetfall placement at the beginning of its action but in all other ways activates as normal. Note: The action is chosen at activation, before scatter is determined. Choose the action carefully as a poor scatter roll could render some actions ineffective.

rules.title: Gläubig
description: When performing an Engage that leads to an Assault (i.e. at least eine unit is within 15cm of an enemy unit), units that have the 'Gläubig' special rule gain Furchtlos, und the formation counts as having eine additional character with the 'Inspirierend' special rule. These effects lasts until the end of the current turn, but are lost if all units with 'Gläubig' in the formation are destroyed.

rules.title: Bionics
description: The extensive bionic modifications undergone by the Iron Hands und the Iron Warriors increases their resistance to physical trauma. Characters with the Bionics special rule increases the Armour of their unit to 3+ when added to a unit of INF.

rules.title: Notreparaturen
description: As long as a formation contains a unit with the 'Notreparaturen' special ability, all Armoured Vehicle units in the formation gains Unmodifizierter Rettungswurf.

rules.title: Extended Command
description: Formations with at least eine unit with the 'Extended Command' ability extend the range at which Befehlshabers within the formation can call other formations to follow them when they make a combined assault from 5cm to 15cm (see 2.1.2).

rules.title: They Shall Know No Fear
description: Space Marines are renowned für their tenacity und bravery. This is represented by the following rules:

• It takes 2 Blast Markers to suppress a Space Marine unit oder kill a unit in a broken formation (ignore any leftover Blast Markers)
  • Space Marine formations are only broken if they have 2 Blast Markers pro unit in the formation.
  • Space Marines formations only count half their number of Blaster markers in assault resolution (rounding down to a minimum of eine). Halve the number of extra hits suffered by a Space Marine formation that loses an assault, rounding down in favour of the Space Marines.
  • When a broken Space Marine formation rallies, it receives a number of Blast Markers equal to the number of units, rather than half this number.

rules.title: Space Marine Transports
description: The Space Marines are a highly mobile army. Because of this, the Punkte cost of a detachment usually includes enough Rhino transport vehicles to transport it und any Erweiterungen that have been taken. Determine the number of Rhinos needed after all Erweiterungen have been purchased. The number of Rhinos will always be the minimum needed to carry the formation, you can’t take extras along to cover any losses!

Note that many formations don’t receive Rhinos, usually because they can’t fit into them. Detachments that come with Rhinos will be noted as having plus transport in the units section of the army list opposite.

Also note that you don’t have to take Rhinos if you don’t want to. If you’d rather field the formation on foot instead, so it can act as a garrison für example, oder be transported in a Thunderhawk, then you may do so.

In addition, you may choose to replace a detachment’s Rhinos with Drop Pods. If you do this then the detachment will enter play in a Drop Pod using the rules für Planetfall (see Planetfall). Note that if you choose to do this you will also require a Space Marine Strike Cruiser oder Battle Barge to deploy the Drop Pods from.

Before jeweils game, after the opposing army is known but before objectives are placed, the Space Marine player may choose which formations with the plus transport aspect are deployed in Rhinos, Drop Pods oder on foot. If the formation has any units unable to deploy in Drop Pods then that option cannot be selected.

rules.title: Grey Knights Transports
description: Grey Knights formations with 'plus transport' may take Grey Knights Rhinos instead of normal Rhinos.

rules.title: Imperial Fists Transports
description: The Imperial Fists are a highly mobile army. Because of this, the Punkte cost of a detachment usually includes enough Rhino transport vehicles to transport it und any Erweiterungen that have been taken. Determine the number of Rhinos needed after all Erweiterungen have been purchased. The number of Rhinos will always be the minimum needed to carry the formation, you can’t take extras along to cover any losses!

Note that many formations don’t receive Rhinos, usually because they can’t fit into them. Detachments that come with Rhinos will be noted as having plus transport in the units section of the army list opposite.
Also note that you don’t have to take Rhinos if you don’t want to. If you’d rather field the formation on foot instead, so it can act as a garrison für example, then you may do so.

Before jeweils game, after the opposing army is known but before objectives are placed, the Imperial Fists player may choose which formations with the plus transport aspect are deployed in Rhinos oder on foot.

rules.title: Im Sattel geboren
description: White Scars are masters of lightning-fast hit-und-run attacks, never allowing the enemy to force a decisive oder static engagement. Units with Im Sattel geboren may consolidate 15cm instead of the usual 5cm.

rules.title: Schnell wie der Wind
description: Units with Schnell wie der Wind ignore the -1 to hit penalty on shooting when carrying out a double action, but do not gain the +1 to hit bonus on shooting when carrying out a sustained fire action.

rules.title: White Scars Transports
description: The White Scars are an exceptionally mobile army. Because of this the Punkte cost of a detachment usually includes enough transport vehicles to transport it und any Erweiterungen that have been taken. The number of vehicles will always be the minimum needed to carry the formation, you can’t take extras along to cover any losses!

Note that many formations don’t receive transports, usually because they can’t fit into them. Detachments that come with vehicles will be noted as having 'plus transport'. White Scars detachments must take the transport vehicles für a detachment. You cannot leave them behind in order to use the unit as a garrison, to use Teleportieren oder in order to be deployed by a Thunderhawk.

In addition, you may choose to replace a detachment’s Rhinos with Drop Pods. If you do this then the detachment will enter play in a Drop Pod using the rules für Planetfall (see Planetfall). Note that if you choose to do this you will also require a Space Marine Strike Cruiser oder Battle Barge to deploy the Drop Pods from.

Before jeweils game, after the opposing army is known but before objectives are placed, the White Scars player may choose which formations with the plus transport aspect are deployed in Rhinos oder Drop Pods. If the formation has any units unable to deploy in Drop Pods then that option cannot be selected.

rules.title: Navis Nobilite
description: Grey Knight spacecraft are among the fastest und best piloted ships in the Galaxy. If a Grey Knights Strike Cruiser has been bought, the Blood Ravens player counts as having a Strategy Rating of 6 für the purposes of choosing which turn the spacecraft will pass over the battlefield.

rules.title: Ad Hoc Detachments
description: By necessity, the Ordo Xenos has become experts of improvisation, rapidly mustering local allies und adapting to the Deathwatch's ever-changing roster of skills und individuals. Für this reason, formations with Befehlshaber may also use the ability when their own oder another friendly formation within 5cm of their formation is defending against an assault, declaring both formations to be intermingled (see 1.12.10). Once declared intermingled, the Befehlshabers' formations follow all rules exactly as if the enemy had declared them intermingled. Note that if either player declares intermingling, the formations are intermingled.

rules.title: Wings of the Sky Angel
description: All Deathwatch Detachments must start the game in the reserves, transported in either a Dark Hunter Class Destroyer, a Corvus Blackstar Dropship, oder a Deathwatch Thunderhawk Transporter.
In addition, all AA shots have einen zusätzlichen -1 to hit against Corvus Blackstar Dropships.

rules.title: Descent of Angels
description: Units in a formation with Stormravens does not have to roll für scatter when using the Planetfall special rule. Place the first Stormraven within 15cm of the pre-plotted drop zone co-ordinates und place all other units in the formation within 15cm of this unit und in coherency. Units may not be placed in impassable terrain oder enemy zones of control.

rules.title: Lucifer Pattern Engine
description: Units with the Lucifer Pattern Engine special rule gain einen zusätzlichen 5cm speed when carrying out an Engage action.

rules.title: Blood Angels Rhinos
description: Blood Angels formations with 'plus transport' may take Blood Angels Rhinos instead of normal Rhinos.

rules.title: Pack Mentality
description: Space Wolves Packs counts as having eine character with the Inspirierend special rule when they initiate an assault where they have another formation with the Pack Mentality special rule in support.

rules.title: Apocalyptic Barrage
description: Uses the Orbital Barrage Template instead of the ordinary template.

rules.title: Independent
description: The Independent special rule allows a War Engine formation to operate as zwei independent War Engines für all purposes, including für determining the army BTS (jeweils unit counts as its own formation worth half of the Punkte value of the original formation, including Erweiterungen). If eine of the zwei War Engines are destroyed, the surviving eine immediately recieves a Blast Marker.

rules.title: Telemetrieempfänger
description: Units that Teleportieren within 15cm from a friendly, unbroken unit with Telemetrieempfänger (except from teleporting formations) may re-roll 1:s when testing für Teleportieren Mishap.

In addition, formations that exclusively consists of models with Teleportieren may be set up in a spacecraft if such has been bought. From there, they can either Teleportieren normally, oder coordinate their Teleportieren with the spacecraft's activation.

Teleports coordinated mit einemspacecraft activation happen after Orbital Barrage, Pin-Points und all events related to formations making Planetfall has been resolved. All such teleports counts as taking place simultaneously, not eine after another. The entire formation must be placed within 15cm of a unit with the Telemetrieempfänger special rule. If they are unable oder unwilling to do so they must wait und Teleportieren normally in later turns.

rules.title: Honour Guard
description: Units with the Honour Guard special rule are Furchtlos as long as their formation contains a character with the Oberbefehlshaber special rule. If they are in the same formation, the Oberbefehlshaber may be added to a unit with this special rule.

rules.title: Land Speeder Escort
description: All types of Land Speeders bought as part of the 'Raven Guard Land Speeders' upgrade gain the Planetfall special rule (only roll to scatter once für the entire formation). In addition, such Land Speeders may start the game transported in an air transport, taking up no transport space, und Zählt als having the Sprungmodule special rule when disembarking their transport. They may not be picked up again once on the battlefield.

rules.title: Expert Reconnaissance
description: Friendly Raven Guard formations that enter the battlefield through Planetfall that are placed within 30cm of a unit with the Expert Reconnaissance special rule does not roll für scatter. In addition, friendly Raven Guard formations that enter the battlefield through Teleportieren und are placed within 15cm of a unit with the Expert Reconnaissance special rule may re-roll 1:s when testing für Teleportieren Mishap.

rules.title: Fleet of Foot
description: Dark Eldar und Harlequin formations gain +1 when attempting to make a March action. In addition, they may still lend support fire in assaults, help claim a crossfire bonus, und fire AA after taking a March action.

rules.title: Black Heart Coterie
description: The army must include a Black Heart Coterie. The enemy counts as having achieved the ‘Break Their Spirit’ (BTS) victory condition if they destroy this formation oder the most expensive formation in the army.

rules.title: Wraithkind Coterie
description: The army must include a Wraithkind Coterie. The enemy counts as having achieved the ‘Break Their Spirit’ (BTS) victory condition if they destroy this formation und/oder the most expensive formation in the army.

rules.title: Webway Portal
description: A army that includes any Webway Portals may place bis zu drei formations in reserve, Infanterie Einheiten in these reserve formations may Zählt als Beritten in their transports. These formations may enter play by activating und moving onto the table through a friendly Webway Portal during the game, measuring their first move from any part of the position the portal occupies on the battlefield.

A Webway Portal may only be used once pro turn, und if the formation fails to activate when attempting to enter via a Webway, it may only take a hold action offboard und regroup. Only INF, LV, oder AVs with the Geländegängig ability may use Webway Portals. H-AV units may not use portals unless noted otherwise.
Jeweils time a formation uses a broken Portal it receives eine Blast Marker.

If a Webway is in an enemy zone of control, any formation that enters through it must Engage that formation(s). In addition, if it is also directly under an enemy formation, any formation that enters must maximize base contact as much as possible.

rules.title: Large Webway Portal
description: Large Webway Portals follows all the rules für a normal Webway Portals, except AV units are not required to have Geländegängig in order to enter the battlefield through it.

rules.title: Shadowfields
description: Jeweils Shadowfield will automatically stop eine point of damage und then go down. Do not make armour saves für damage stopped by Shadowfields, oder allocate Blast Markers. Once all of a vehicle oder war engine’s Shadowfields have been knocked down, it may be damaged normally und you may make saving throws against any hits that are scored. Hits from close combat ignore Shadowfields but units using their firefight values must first knock down any Shadowfields before they can cause any damage. While a vehicle oder war engine has at least eine operating Shadowfield it counts as being obscured (1.8.2), meaning that all shooting (including AA) without the Ignore Cover ability receive a -1 to hit modifier.

rules.title: Seers of Ulthwé
description: Seers of Ulthwé - Craftworld Ulthwé armies counts as having Strategy Rating 5 für all purposes except für the Strategy Roll at the start of a turn.

rules.title: Great Drake
description: The Great Drake must begin the game in reserve. In the Strategy Phase of any turn, before the strategy roll place the Great Drake within 15cm of a Worldsinger unit.
The Great Drake counts as its own formation und may only enter play in this manner.

While on the table, the Great Drake may only contest objectives. Remove the Great Drake in the End Phase of the turn it arrived, before rallying formations oder counting objectives. Once removed it may not return.

rules.title: Avatar (Biel-Tan)
description: The Avatar must begin the game in reserve. In the Strategy Phase of any turn, before the strategy roll place the Avatar within 15cm of a Farseer unit.
The Avatar counts as its own formation und may only enter play in this manner.
While on the table, the Avatar may only contest objectives. Remove the Avatar in the End Phase of that turn, before rallying formations oder counting objectives. Once removed it may not return.

rules.title: Avatar (Lugganath)
description: The Avatar must begin the game in reserve. In the Strategy Phase of any turn, before the strategy roll place the Avatar within 15cm of a Spiritseer character oder a Farseer unit.
The Avatar counts as its own formation und may only enter play in this manner.
While on the table, the Avatar may only contest objectives. Remove the Avatar in the End Phase of that turn, before rallying formations oder counting objectives. Once removed it may not return.

rules.title: Avatar (Saim-Hann)
description: The Avatar must begin the game in reserve. In the Strategy Phase of any turn, before the strategy roll place the Avatar within 15cm of a Beritten Farseer unit.
The Avatar counts as its own formation und may only enter play in this manner.
While on the table, the Avatar may only contest objectives. Remove the Avatar in the End Phase of that turn, before rallying formations oder counting objectives. Once removed it may not return.

rules.title: Avatar (Iyanden)
description: The Avatar must begin the game in reserve. In the Strategy Phase of any turn, before the strategy roll place the Avatar within 15cm of a Spiritseer character oder a Wraithseer unit.
The Avatar counts as its own formation und may only enter play in this manner.
While on the table, the Avatar may only contest objectives. Remove the Avatar in the End Phase of that turn, before rallying formations oder counting objectives. Once removed it may not return.

description: Only Mandrakes are allowed to garrison objectives in the Epic tournament game scenario.

rules.title: May not Garrison (Saim-Hann)
description: Only Saim-Hann Hornets are allowed to garrison objectives in the Epic tournament game scenario.

rules.title: May not Garrison (Iyanden)
description: Only Eldar Rangers und War Geländegängigs are allowed to garrison objectives in the Epic tournament game scenario.

rules.title: May not Garrison (Lugganath)
description: Only Ghost Walkers und Wasp Walkers are allowed to garrison objectives in the Epic tournament game scenario.

rules.title: May not Garrison (Yme-Loc)
description: Only Hornets are allowed to garrison objectives in the Epic tournament game scenario.

rules.title: May not Garrison (Fir Lirithion)
description: No formations are allowed to garrison in the Epic tournament game scenario.

description: Only Mandrakes are allowed to garrison objectives in the Epic tournament game scenario.

rules.title: May not Garrison (Wraithkind)

rules.title: Farsight
description: Eldar formations that include a unit with the Farsight ability may ignore the -1 penalty to Action test rolls when attempting to retain the Initiative.

In addition once pro turn the Eldar player may attempt to retain the Initiative twice in a row (i.e. allowing the Eldar player to take 3 activations in a row). Any Eldar formation may be selected, including those without a unit with Farsight, but at least eine unit with the Farsight ability must be in play on the battlefield.
The formation selected must still carry out an Action Test mit einem-1 modifier, unless the selected formation has a unit with the Farsight ability.

rules.title: Hit und Run
description: Eldar/Dark Eldar/Harlequin formations that perform an Advance oder Double action may choose to shoot either before oder after jeweils move, but may still only shoot once. If the formation chooses to Double the -1 to hit penalty applies even if the shot is taken before moving. In addition, formations that win an assault may consolidate bis zu their speed value rather than the normal 5cms.

rules.title: Holofields (x)
description: Holofields provide a saving throw to the value of 'x'. This save may always be taken even against weapons with the Macro Weapon oder Titan Killer abilities.

If a unit has Verstärkte Panzerung it may use its re-roll unless hit by a Lanze, Macro Weapon oder Titan Killer attack but the re-roll uses the units armour value. Hits saved by the Holofield do not generate Blast Markers, even if they have the Disrupt ability.
Against Titan Killer attacks that cause extra damage make eine Holofield save roll, if this is successful the unit takes no damage, if the roll fails it suffers all the damage.

Holofield saves can be reduced by modifiers such as the -1 to saves from a cross fire und weapons with the Scharfschütze ability. If a unit with Holofield also has a save from being in Cover, it must choose which save to use.

rules.title: Lanze
description: When units with Verstärkte Panzerung are hit by a weapon with the Lanze ability they do not get to re-roll failed armour saves.

rules.title: Independent Twins
description: Allows a formation of Revenant Titans to operate as zwei independent War Engines für all purposes, including für determining the army BTS. If eine of the pair is destroyed, the surviving Revenant Synchronisierter receives a Blast Marker.
In addition, Independent Twins may use the Befehlshaber ability with its Synchronisierter. In this case, the Befehlshaber ability counts as having an unlimited range instead of the normal 5cm.

rules.title: Cegorach, the Laughing God
description: As long as there is at least eine Solitaire present on the battlefield, all enemy non-Harlequin formations counts as being within 30cm of an enemy unit für the purposes of rally tests during the End Phase.

rules.title: Shadowsight
description: Units that Teleportieren within 15cm from a friendly, unbroken unit with Shadowsight may re-roll 1:s when testing für Teleportieren Mishap. This also applies when the unit with Shadowsight is Teleporting.

rules.title: Masters of the Webway
description: Harlequins are the unparallelled masters of the Webway. They must start the game in the reserves, und may only enter the battlefield by Teleporting oder by using a Wraithgate. Harlequins may re-roll 1:s when testing für Teleportieren Mishap.

rules.title: Dance of Shadows
description: Gives the enemy einen zusätzlichen -1 to hit modifier to all FF attacks against a formation mit einemShadowseer.

rules.title: Summoning
description: Any formation that either has a unit with Daemonic Pact oder a Daemonic Pact formation upgrade may summon Daemons. Jeweils Daemonic Pact in the army automatically provides eine point to the Lesser Daemon Pool at the start of the battle (the player may also purchase additional Lesser Daemon Pool Punkte und/oder Greater Daemon Pool Punkte).

Daemon Pools are not faction specific. The size of the Daemon Pools must be visible to all players at all times und it is suggested that either tokens oder dice are used to indicate the size of the pool. As daemons are summoned the pool must be changed to reflect its current size.

To summon daemons the formation declares its intention to summon before any action roll is made (but after the choice of action). If the formation that wishes to Summon is being transported inside another formation (e.g. a Chaos Thunderhawk) it cannot choose to Summon when the Chaos Thunderhawk prepares to activate.

The player then rolls 2D3 to generate the number of Summoning Points available für this formation. The formation may then summon daemons bis zu the number of Summoning Points generated, with any Punkte not used lost, bis zu the number of Lesser oder Greater Daemon Pool Punkte left.

Summoned units must be setup with their base completely within 5cm of any non-summoned unit in the summoning formation (i.e. You cannot place a chain of summoned units). If the summoning formation has the Transport ability, newly summoned units can be set up inside if there is space left. They cannot be placed in enemy zones of control oder impassable terrain. Summoned units become part of the summoning formation für all rules purposes as long as they remain on the battlefield.

Summoned Lesser Daemons are Entbehrlich, but they are otherwise counted as normal units, und are included when working out if a formation outnumbers an opponent in an assault oder is broken by Blast Markers, etc. Note that Daemons that are killed in an assault do count towards the number of units killed by the enemy when working out modifiers für assault resolution.

Summoned units remain in play until the End Phase of the turn in which they were summoned. After all formations have attempted to rally any summoned units are removed from play und the total of their Daemon Pool cost is returned to the relevant Daemon Pool. This may cause the formation to break, if the number of Blast Markers now equals oder exceeds the number of units in the formation.
When a formation becomes broken all its summoned units are destroyed.

When calculating victory Punkte, the Lesser Daemon Pool scores half Punkte if the pool has less than oder equal to half (round up) its original number of daemons remaining. The Lesser Daemon Pool scores full Punkte if the pool has less than oder equal to a quarter (round up) its daemons remaining. Treat Greater Daemons as War Engines für the purpose of calculating victory Punkte.

rules.title: Black Legion Summoning Rules
description: All formations in the Black Legion worship Chaos Undivided. Chaos Undivided formations with Daemonic Pact may summon any of the following Daemons (brackets indicating the Summoning Points cost):
Lesser Daemons: Daemonettes of Slaanesh (1), Plaguebearers of Nurgle (1), Bloodletters of Khorne (1), Horrors of Tzeentch (1), Daemonic Beasts of Chaos Undivided (1).
Greater Daemons: Slaanesh Keeper of Secrets (8), Nurgle Great Unclean Ein (8), Khorne Bloodthirster (8), Tzeentch Lord of Change (8)
Nicht mehr als eine of jeweils type of Greater Daemon can be on the battlefield at the same time. No formation can contain more than eine Greater Daemon at a time.
Note that while the Summoning Points cost of summoning jeweils type of daemonic unit varies, the Daemon Pool cost is always eine.

description: All formations in Word Bearers worship Chaos Undivided. Chaos Undivided formations with Daemonic Pact may summon any of the following Daemons (brackets indicating the Summoning Points cost):

Greater Daemons: Slaanesh Keeper of Secrets (8), Nurgle Great Unclean Ein (8), Khorne Bloodthirster (8), Tzeentch Lord of Change (8)
Nicht mehr als eine of jeweils type of Greater Daemon can be on the battlefield at the same time. No formation can contain more than eine Greater Daemon at a time.
Note that while the Summoning Points cost of summoning jeweils type of daemonic unit varies, the Daemon Pool cost is always eine.

Greater Daemons: Keeper of Secrets (8)

Note that while the Summoning Points cost of summoning jeweils type of daemonic unit varies, the Daemon Pool cost is always eine.

rules.title: Alpha Legion Summoning Rules
description: All Alpha Legion Cultist formations worship Chaos Undivided. Formations with Daemonic Icon may summon the following Daemons (brackets indicating the Summoning Points cost):
Lesser Daemons: Daemonettes of Slaanesh (1), Plaguebearers of Nurgle (1), Bloodletters of Khorne (1), Horrors of Tzeentch (1), Daemonic Beasts of Chaos Undivided (1)
Note that while the Summoning Points cost of summoning jeweils type of daemonic unit varies, the Daemon Pool cost is always eine.

rules.title: Night Lords Summoning Rules
description: All Night Lords formations are aligned with Chaos Undivided. Formations mit einemunit with Daemonic Pact may summon the following Daemons (brackets indicating the Summoning Points cost):
Lesser Daemons: Furies of Chaos Undivided (2)
Note that while the Summoning Points cost of summoning jeweils type of daemonic unit varies, the Daemon Pool cost is always eine.

rules.title: Slaves to Darkness Summoning Rules
description: All formations in the Slaves to Darkness worship Chaos Undivided. Formations with either a Daemonic Icon unit oder a Daemonic Pact formation upgrade may summon the following Daemons (brackets indicating the Summoning Points cost):
Lesser Daemons: Daemonettes of Slaanesh (1), Plaguebearers of Nurgle (1), Bloodletters of Khorne (1), Horrors of Tzeentch (1), Daemonic Beasts of Chaos Undivided (1)
Note that while the Summoning Points cost of summoning jeweils type of daemonic unit varies, the Daemon Pool cost is always eine.
Füge eine Lesser Daemon Pool point to the Lesser Daemon Pool für jeweils unit with Daemonic Icon, oder formation with Daemonic Pact.

rules.title: Daemonic Incursion Summoning Rules
description: Formations in a Daemonic Incursion army may summon Lesser Daemons from the power they are aligned with. They do not need an upgrade to do so. Cultist Coven formations are aligned with all powers present in the army at the start of the battle. (Brackets indicating the Summoning Points cost):
Slaanesh: Daemonettes of Slaanesh (1), Fiends of Slaanesh (1), Seekers of Slaanesh (2)
Nurgle: Plaguebearers of Nurgle (1), Beasts of Nurgle (1), Plague Drones of Nurgle (2)
Khorne: Bloodletters of Khorne (1), Fleshhounds of Khorne (1), Bloodcrushers of Khorne (2)
Tzeentch: Horrors of Tzeentch (1), Screamers of Tzeentch (1), Flammenwerfer of Tzeentch (2)
Note that while the Summoning Points cost of summoning jeweils type of daemonic unit varies, the Daemon Pool cost is always eine.

When calculating Victory Points of the purposes of Tie Break, only the part of the Lesser Daemon Pool that was bought by itself is considered when checking if there is less than half remaining. Lesser Daemon Pool Punkte that was bought as part of a formation are counted towards that formation's starting units.

rules.title: TTL Summoning Rules
description: TTL formations with Daemonic Pact may summon Lesser Daemons from the power they are aligned with (brackets indicating the Summoning Points cost):
Slaanesh: Daemonettes of Slaanesh (1), Fiends of Slaanesh (1)
Nurgle: Plaguebearers of Nurgle (1), Beasts of Nurgle (1)
Khorne: Bloodletters of Khorne (1), Fleshhounds of Khorne (1)
Tzeentch: Horrors of Tzeentch (1), Flammenwerfer of Tzeentch (1)
Chaos Undivided: Daemonettes of Slaanesh (2), Plaguebearers of Nurgle (2), Bloodletters of Khorne (2), Horrors of Tzeentch (2), Daemonic Beasts of Chaos Undivided (1)
Note that while the Summoning Points cost of summoning jeweils type of daemonic unit varies, the Daemon Pool cost is always eine.

Nurgle: Plaguebearers of Nurgle (1), Beasts of Nurgle (1)
Khorne: Bloodletters of Khorne (1), Fleshhounds of Khorne (1)
Tzeentch: Horrors of Tzeentch (1), Flammenwerfer of Tzeentch (1)
Chaos Undivided: Daemonettes of Slaanesh (2), Plaguebearers of Nurgle (2), Bloodletters of Khorne (2), Horrors of Tzeentch (2), Daemonic Beasts of Chaos Undivided (1)
Note that while the Summoning Points cost of summoning jeweils type of daemonic unit varies, the Daemon Pool cost is always eine.

rules.title: Black Legion Characters
description: Black Legion characters may only be added to units of Chaos Space Marines, Havocs, Raptors, Chaos Assault Bikes, oder Chaos Terminatoren.

rules.title: Iron Warriors Characters
description: Iron Warriors characters may only be added to units of Chaos Space Marines, Iron Warriors Assault Marines, Iron Warriors Havocs, Tyrant Terminatoren, oder Chaos Cybots.

rules.title: Night Lords Characters
description: Night Lords characters may only be added to units of Night Raptors, Chaos Space Marines, Chaos Trikes, Night Lords Assault Marines, oder Chaos Terminatoren.

rules.title: Emperor's Children Characters
description: Emperor's characters may only be added to units of Chaos Space Marines, Chaos Assault Bikes, Noise Marines, Noise Marine Havocs, Raptors, oder Sirenshriek Terminatoren.

rules.title: Death Guard Characters
description: Death Guard characters may only be added to units of Chaos Space Marines, Havocs, Plague Marines, oder Blightlord Terminatoren.

rules.title: World Eaters Characters
description: World Eaters characters may only be added to units of World Eaters Assault Marines, Khorne Berzerkers, Skullseeker Terminatoren, Juggernaut Riders, oder Khorne Berzerker Assault Bikes.

rules.title: Word Bearers Characters
description: Word Bearers characters may only be added to units of Chaos Space Marines, Havocs, Chaos Assault Bikes, Chaos Terminatoren, Aspiring Champions, Word Bearers Possessed, oder Word Bearers Iconoclasts.

rules.title: Augment Summoning (+x)
description: Units with Augment Summoning (+x) add a number of summoning Punkte equal to 'x' when the formation they are in summons daemons (see Summoning). Für example, a unit noted as having Augment Summoning (+2) would allow a formation mit einemDaemonic Pact to roll 2D3+2 für summoning Punkte as opposed to the usual 2D3.

rules.title: Daemonic Focus
description: Units with Daemonic focus may keep any oder all summoned units that belong to the formation in play. Summoned units do not vanish back into the warp after the formation has attempted to rally. Daemonic Focus may not be used to keep summoned units in play if the formation is broken. Multiples of Daemonic Focus have no additional effect.

rules.title: Fickle Masters
description: In the Strategy Phase of jeweils turn if the Chaos player rolls a 6, they are rewarded with 1 summoning point to add to the Lesser Daemon Pool. However, if a 1 is rolled, 1 summoning Punkte is lost from the Lesser Daemon Pool. In the latter case, if no Lesser Daemon Pool has been purchased, oder if it is empty, then there is no effect.

rules.title: Changer of Ways
description: Formations containing Thousands Sons Daemon Princes und Scarab Occult Terminatoren may only contain units of INF und AV units with Geländegängig, und must be held in the reserves at the start of the game. Such formations may only enter the Battlefield through a Warp Rift.

rules.title: Daemon Engine (x)
description: Formations where at least eine unit has the Daemon Engine (x) special rule gain the bonus associated with that faction:

• Chaos Undivided: Formation ignores the -1 modifier für enemy formations within 30cm when rallying.
  • Khorne: Formation gains +1 to activate when attempting to Engage.
  • Nurgle: Formation gains +1 to activate when attempting to Marshal.
  • Slaanesh: Formation gains +1 to activate when attempting to Double.
  • Tzeentch: Formation gains +1 to activate when attempting to Advance.

rules.title: Black Legion Dreadclaws
description: Dreadclaws allow a Chaos formation to enter play using the planetfall rules if a spaceship has been purchased to carry them. Units in a formation with Dreadclaws deploy using the planetfall rules but do not roll für scatter. Place the first unit within 15cm of the pre-plotted drop zone co-ordinates und place all other units in the formation within 15cm of this unit und in coherency. Units may not be placed in impassable terrain oder enemy zones of control.
The following units may be deployed using Dreadclaws: Noise Marines, Rubric Marines, Khorne Berzerkers, Plague Marines, Chaos Space Marines, Havocs, Chaos Terminatoren, Kyborgs, Chaos Cybots.

rules.title: Night Lords Dreadclaws
description: Dreadclaws allow a Chaos formation to enter play using the planetfall rules if a spaceship has been purchased to carry them. Units in a formation with Dreadclaws deploy using the planetfall rules but do not roll für scatter. Place the first unit within 15cm of the pre-plotted drop zone co-ordinates und place all other units in the formation within 15cm of this unit und in coherency. Units may not be placed in impassable terrain oder enemy zones of control.
The following units may be deployed using Dreadclaws: Night Lords Assault Marines, Atramentar Terminatoren, Night Lords Cybots.

description: Dreadclaws allow a Chaos formation to enter play using the planetfall rules if a spaceship has been purchased to carry them. Units in a formation with Dreadclaws deploy using the planetfall rules but do not roll für scatter. Place the first unit within 15cm of the pre-plotted drop zone co-ordinates und place all other units in the formation within 15cm of this unit und in coherency. Units may not be placed in impassable terrain oder enemy zones of control.
The following units may be deployed using Dreadclaws: Chaos Space Marines, Havocs, Chaos Terminatoren, Word Bearers Possessed, Chaos Cybots.

description: Dreadclaws  allow  a  chaos  formation  to  enter  play  using  the  planetfall  rules  if  a  spaceship  has  been purchased to carry them. Units in a formation with Dreadclaws deploy using the planetfall rules but do not roll für scatter. Place the first unit within 15cm of the pre-plotted drop zone co-ordinates und place all other units in the formation within 15cm of this unit und in coherency. Units may not be placed in impassable terrain oder enemy zones of control.
The following units may be deployed using Dreadclaws: Noise Marines, Chaos Space Marines, Havocs, Sirenshriek Terminatoren, Chaos Cybots.

description: Dreadclaws allow a Chaos formation to enter play using the planetfall rules if a spaceship has been purchased to carry them. Units in a formation with Dreadclaws deploy using the planetfall rules but do not roll für scatter. Place the first unit within 15cm of the pre-plotted drop zone co-ordinates und place all other units in the formation within 15cm of this unit und in coherency. The following units may be deployed using Dreadclaws: Chaos Space Marines, Havocs, Kyborgs, Tyrant Terminatoren, Chaos Cybots, Chaos Siege Cybots.

rules.title: World Eaters Dreadclaws
description: Dreadclaws  allow  a  chaos  formation  to  enter  play  using  the  planetfall  rules  if  a  spaceship  has  been purchased to carry them. Units in a formation with Dreadclaws deploy using the planetfall rules but do not roll für scatter. Place the first unit within 15cm of the pre-plotted drop zone co-ordinates und place all other units in the formation within 15cm of this unit und in coherency. Units may not be placed in impassable terrain oder enemy zones of control.
The following units may be deployed using Dreadclaws: Khorne Berzerkers, World Eaters Marines, Skullseeker Terminatoren, Cybots, Mutilators.

rules.title: Infestation
description: Formations completely made up of units with the Infestation special rule must be held in reserve und deployed using the Teleportieren rules. In addition, units with the Infestation special rule may only contest scenario objectives.

rules.title: LatD Eternal Animosity
description: Jeweils Support Coven in a Lost und the Damned army owes allegiance to either eine of the Ruinous Powers oder to Chaos Undivided. With the exception of Chaos Undivided, the different factions harbour eternal animosity against jeweils other. This state of affairs is represented by the following rules:
A Lost und the Damned army with formations belonging to the faction of Khorne may not include formations from the faction of Slaanesh (und vice-versa).
A Lost und the Damned army with formations belonging to the faction of Nurgle may not include formations from the faction of Tzeentch (und vice-versa).

rules.title: StD Eternal Animosity
description: Jeweils Dark Mechanicus allied formation in a Slaves to Darkness army owes allegiance to either eine of the Ruinous Powers oder to Chaos Undivided. With the exception of Chaos Undivided, the different factions harbour eternal animosity against jeweils other. This state of affairs is represented by the following rules:
A Slaves to Darkness army with formations belonging to the faction of Khorne may not include formations from the faction of Slaanesh (und vice-versa).
A Slaves to Darkness army with formations belonging to the faction of Nurgle may not include formations from the faction of Tzeentch (und vice-versa).

rules.title: DI Eternal Animosity

A Daemonic Incursion army with formations belonging to the faction of Khorne may not include formations from the faction of Slaanesh (und vice-versa).
A Daemonic Incursion army with formations belonging to the faction of Nurgle may not include formations from the faction of Tzeentch (und vice-versa).

With the exception of Chaos Undivided, the different factions harbour eternal animosity against jeweils other. This state of affairs is represented by the following rules:
A Traitor Titan Legion army with formations belonging to the faction of Khorne may not include formations from the faction of Slaanesh (und vice-versa).
A Traitor Titan Legion army with formations belonging to the faction of Nurgle may not include formations from the faction of Tzeentch (und vice-versa).
