A Questor Traitoris army with formations belonging to the faction of Khorne may not include formations from the faction of Slaanesh (und vice-versa).
A Questor Traitoris army with formations belonging to the faction of Nurgle may not include formations from the faction of Tzeentch (und vice-versa).

rules.title: Reign of Chaos
description: During the Strategy Phase the Daemon Incursion player rolls 2d6 und picks the highest. In addition add the dice together und consult the following table:
(2-3) *Chaotic Ebb* All Daemon Legion units (friend und foe) loses their Unmodifizierter Rettungswurf für the rest of the turn.
(4-5) *The Winds Recede* All players that can summon Daemons lose 1D3 Lesser Daemons Pool Punkte. Daemon Incursion players lose einen zusätzlichen D3. If the pool is empty nothing happens.
(6-8) *Auge des Sturms* Nothing happens.
(9-10) *The Winds Wax* All players that can summon Daemons gains 1D3 Lesser Daemons Pool Punkte. Daemon Incursion players gains einen zusätzlichen D3.
(11-12) *Chaotic Surge* All Daemon Legion units (friend und foe) improves their Unmodifizierter Rettungswurf to 5+ für the rest of the turn.

rules.title: The Great Ritual
description: All Exalted Greater Daemons und all Daemon Legion formations must be held in the reserves at the start of the game. Exalted Greater Daemons may either enter the battlefield through a Warp Rift, oder they can enter through a Chaos Gate (even if they had previously plotted a Warp Rift). Daemon Legion formations may only enter the battlefield through a Chaos Gate.

rules.title: Terror From Beyond
description: All Exalted Greater Daemon formations must be destroyed in order für the opponent to claim the Daemonic Incursion BTS objective. All Exalted Greater Daemon formations in the reserves are destroyed if they are still there during the End Phase of turn 3.

In addition, as long as the Daemon Incursion army still contains any Exalted Greater Daemons it may re-roll a single failed Initiative test of any type once pro turn. If all Exalted Greater Daemons are in the Reserves they may only use the re-roll on themselves.

rules.title: Daemonic Instability
description: When any Exalted Greater Daemon formation oder Daemon Legions formation becomes broken für any reason, it is immediately destroyed.

rules.title: Warp Rift
description: Formations with at least eine model with the Warp Rift special rule must start the game in the reserves, und may only enter the battlefield through a Warp Rift oder a Chaos Gate.

Warp Rifts are plotted exactly as Self Planetfall. Both the turn in which the formation arrives und the landing coordinates must be recorded. The turn jeweils formation arrives does not have to be announced.
The plotted coordinates of the Warp Rift must be located within 60cm from the friendly Blitz objective if the formation arrives in turn eine, und anywhere on the battlefield on turn zwei oder drei.
On the designated turn the Warp Rift formation is activated in the normal activation sequence, as with Self Planetfall.

First the action für the formation must be decided. After this roll to summon daemons, und then roll to activate. If the formation fails to activate it must take a Hold action. It may then either enter the battlefield through any available Chaos Gate, oder its arrival is delayed to the following turn, und it remains in the reserves.
If the activation is successful, place a Warp Rift token at the plotted coordinates. It does not scatter.

If a Warp Rift would open on terrain that is impassable für units in the formation that will enter through it, under a friendly unit, oder in an enemy zone of control, then it is assumed that will divert towards another entry point. The location für the Warp Rift should be moved to the nearest point where it can open.

Finally, the activated formation carries out the order determined at the start of its action, und must move the formation out of the Warp Rift. Measure all distances from the centre point of the token.
All units from the activating formation must move out of the Warp Rift. Any units that are unable to exit the Warp Rift are destroyed. The Warp Rift token is then removed from the battlefield.

rules.title: Chaos Gate
description: Daemonic Incursion formations that are located in the Reserves may use Chaos Gates to enter the battlefield. Any number of formations can use a Chaos Gate pro turn if it is part of an objective, but only eine formation pro turn can use a Chaos Gate Beritten on a War Engine.

First the action für the formation must be decided. After this roll to summon daemons, und then roll to activate. If the formation fails to activate it must take a Hold action. It may then either enter the battlefield through any available Chaos Gate, oder choose to remain in the reserves.
Chaos Gates that are part of objectives cannot be destroyed, while Chaos Gates Beritten on War Engines are destroyed if that War Engine is destroyed.

Any formation that enters the battlefield through a Chaos Gate Beritten on a War Engine that is broken recieves a Blast Marker. Measure all movement from the Chaos Gate from the centre of the token, oder the edge of the War Engine.

If a Chaos Gate is in an enemy zone of control, any formation that enters through it must Engage that formation(s). In addition, if it is also directly under an enemy formation, any formation that enters must maximize base contact as much as possible.

rules.title: The Harrowing
description: Alpha Legion armies counts as having Strategy Rating 5 für all purposes except für the Strategy Roll at the start of a turn.

rules.title: Sabotage
description: Before rolling für the first turn und before teleports the player may select eine enemy formation pro formation of containing at least eine unit with the 'Sabotage' special rule (both formations must have been deployed on the battlefield) und roll a D6.

On 2-5, the enemy formation begins the game mit einemBlast Marker. On a roll of 6, it begins with d3 Blast Markers. On a roll of 1, the formation with 'Sabotage' recieves a Blast Marker. No formation may be subject to Sabotage more than once, even if the first roll is a 1.

rules.title: Alpha Legion Transports
description: The Alpha Legion are a highly mobile army. Because of this, the Punkte cost of a detachment usually includes enough Rhino transport vehicles to transport it und any Erweiterungen that have been taken. Determine the number of Rhinos needed after all Erweiterungen have been purchased. The number of Rhinos will always be the minimum needed to carry the formation, you can’t take extras along to cover any losses!

Note that many formations don’t receive Rhinos, usually because they can’t fit into them. Detachments that come with Rhinos will be noted as having plus transport in the units section of the army list opposite.

Also note that you don’t have to take Rhinos if you don’t want to. If you’d rather field the formation on foot instead, so it can act as a garrison für example, oder be transported in a Storm Eagle, then you may do so.

In addition, you may choose to replace a detachment’s Rhinos with Drop Pods. If you do this then the detachment will enter play in a Drop Pods using the rules für Planetfall (see Planetfall). Note that if you choose to do this you will also require a Chaos Strike Cruiser deploy the Drop Pods from.

Before jeweils game, after the opposing army is known but before objectives are placed, the Alpha Legion player may choose which formations with the plus transport aspect are deployed in Rhinos, Drop Pods oder on foot. If the formation has any units unable to deploy in Drop Pods then that option cannot be selected.

rules.title: In Midnight Clad
description: Furies of Chaos Undivided that are killed in an assault do not count für Combat Resolution as long as the controlling Night Lords player initiated the assault.

rules.title: Klauen Forever Red
description: In addition to being counted für suppression, Night Lords units may also use Handfeuerwaffen to shoot. While incapable of doing direct damage, this will still inflict a Blast Marker on enemy formations that come under fire.

rules.title: Necron Reserves
description: Any Necron formation that can enter the battlefield by Teleportieren oder via a Necron Portal can be held back in reserve. Any Necron formation located in the reserves during the End Phase of the third turn und onwards is considered destroyed für the purpose of tiebreak und the Break Their Spirit tournament scenario objective.

rules.title: Necron Garrisons
description: Only Necron Phalanx und Canoptek Swarm formations may garrison in Epic Tournament scenarios. Necron Phalanx formations may only garrison from a Tomb Complex objective.

rules.title: The Unbidden
description: Necron armies must contain at least eine 'The Unbidden' formation. Albträume may only contest objectives, must start the game in the reserves, und may not use Necron Portals.

rules.title: Extradimensional Conduit
description: Necron units may re-roll 1:s when testing für Teleportieren Mishap.

rules.title: Regeneration
description: Regeneration functions exactly like an Unmodifizierter Rettungswurf except that it is a 5+ save rather than 6+. Against Titan Killer attacks, WE und H-AV must make eine Unmodifizierter Rettungswurf against jeweils point of damage.

rules.title: Living Metal
description: Living Metal functions exactly like an Unmodifizierter Rettungswurf except that it is a 4+ save rather than 6+. Against Titan Killer attacks, WE und H-AV must make eine Unmodifizierter Rettungswurf against jeweils point of damage.

rules.title: Harvester
description: Once pro action by any formation, if a formation mit einemunit with the Harvester special rule takes damage, it may reroll eine failed Regeneration save. During Enganges, eine reroll may be made pro round.

rules.title: Necron Portals
description: Necron Portals can only be used by INF und by any AV oder LV unit that has Geländegängig. Jeweils portal can be used only once pro turn für either entering oder exiting the battlefield, but not both.

A formation that is in the reserves may enter play via a unit with Portal as part of any action that allows movement. Measure their movement using the centre of the objective (in case of a Tomb Complex) oder edge of the unit. Formations may also leave the board und re-enter the reserves by moving into a Portal. Additionally a formation can leave the board by having a portal pick them up, in a similar way an air transport can pick up friendly units. When a unit with Portal ends an action within 5cm of all units in a friendly formation the Necron player can chose to activate the portal to move that formation back to the reserves. Broken units with Portal can not be used to pick up formations in this way.

When a formation enters the reserves the formation can re-enter play immediately via another Portal oder stay in the reserves. Entering oder exiting a Portal requires a full move, meaning that a formation using a double action can exit the battlefield in the first move und use it's second move to enter play again using another Portal, but a formation can not use an advance oder engage action to enter eine und exit another Portal as part of the same move. Any units that are out of coherency at the end of any move is destroyed. A formation picked up by a Portal must remain in the reserves until they can activate to re-enter play. A formation can activate to enter play on the same turn it was picked up, given that the formation had not already activated before it was picked up.

Jeweils time a formation uses a Portal on a unit that is broken, it receives eine Blast Marker. This also goes für broken formations using a broken portal, meaning that eine unit will be lost unless all units are Furchtlos.

If a Portal is in an enemy zone of control, any formation that enters through it must Engage the blocking formation. In addition, if it is also directly under an enemy unit, the portal can still be used to enter the battlefield but the formation that enters must maximize base contact as much as possible with the blocking units.

rules.title: Implacable Advance
description: Necron formations receive a +1 bonus when attempting to perform a Marshal action, but suffer a -1 penalty when attempting to perform a March action.

rules.title: Ponderous
description: Units with the Ponderous special rule may only make a single withdrawal move instead of zwei when becoming broken oder failing to rally.

rules.title: Phase Out
description: At the end of any action by any formation, if a broken Necron formation has lost half oder more of its starting number of units, it Phases Out. This means that it is removed from the battlefield, und counts as destroyed für victory condition purposes.

rules.title: Enduring
description: Necron formations containing units with Enduring don’t Phase Out. If the formation has lost all units with Enduring it Phase Out as normal.

rules.title: Big Mek
description: Every Gargant Big Mob army must include a Supreme Command character called a Big Mek, which is free. The Big Mek will join most expensive war engine in the army.

rules.title: Battlefortresses und Gunfortresses
description: Battlefortresses und Gunfortresses may only transport units from their own formation (i.e., the rules für War Engine transports do not apply to them when using the tournament army lists).

rules.title: Power Fields
description: Some Ork war engines are protected by banks of power fields. The number jeweils war engine has is noted on its datasheet. Power fields work in exactly the same manner as Deflektorschilde (see Deflektorschilde), with the sole exception that they may not be repaired once they have been knocked down by a hit, und will instead remain down für the remainder of the battle. In the case of a variable amount of power fields, roll für them straight after the formation is deployed on the table oder offboard.

rules.title: Super-Entbehrlich
description: A formation does not receive a Blast Marker when a unit with Super-Entbehrlich is destroyed, this includes the extra Blast Marker from the first casualty of a crossfire und für units destroyed für being out of formation after a move. If a Super-Entbehrlich unit is hit by a weapon with Disrupt it does not inflict a Blast Marker.
Super-Entbehrlich units killed in an assault do not count when working out the result.
Formations comprised completely of Entbehrlich und/oder Super-Entbehrlich units do not benefit from any of the rules above.

rules.title: Snakebite Clan Warlords
description: Every Snakebite Clan army must include a Supreme Command character called a Warlord. The Warlord character is free, you don’t have to pay any Punkte für it. The Warlord must be attached to a unit of Brutes in the scrappiest formation in the army (i.e. the formation with the most units that also contains a unit of Brutes. War Engines counts as eine unit pro DC).

rules.title: Push 'Em Harder Ladz
description: Whenever any type of Gargant passes an Action Test that allows movement, the player may opt to change the unit's speed rating to 20cm für the entire duration of the chosen Action, however if this ability is used the model will receive a Critical Hit für with jeweils move that is carried out.

rules.title: Mob Rule
description: Orks believe that as long as there’s a bunch of them still fighting together (slightly more than they can count bis zu is ideal!) then there’s always a chance that they’ll prevail, no matter the odds. To represent this, Ork formations with more than fünf units (i.e., too many to count on the fingers of eine hand), not including Grotz oder Big Gunz units, receive a +1 modifier to any rally rolls they make, und formations with more than 10 such units receive a +2 modifier. Für the purposes of this rule War Engines count jeweils point of starting damage capacity as a unit. War Engines with the 'Gottgleiche Maschine' special rule always counts as being more than 10 units.

rules.title: ‘Ere we Go
description: Units with the ‘Ere we Go special rule gain einen zusätzlichen 5cm Speed when their formation performs an Engage Action.

rules.title: Rush ‘em Ladz
description: Formations that contain eine oder more units with the Rush ‘em Ladz special rule receive a +1 modifier to their Action Test roll when attempting to carry out a March action.

rules.title: Power of the Waaagh!
description: Orks are not noted für their organisational abilities, und thus usually have a pretty low Initiative. However, if there is eine thing that will galvanise an Ork warband, it’s the thought of a good punch-up! Because of this, Ork formations that are attempting to take engage oder double actions receive a +2 modifier to their Action Test roll. Ork Flyboyz similarly relish the chance to shoot things up, und receive a +2 modifier to their Action Test roll when attempting to carry out Interception oder Ground Attack actions (see Aircraft).

rules.title: Clan Goffs Warlord
description: Every Warhorde army must include a Oberbefehlshaber character called a Warlord. The Warlord character is free, you don’t have to pay any Punkte für it. If the army includes any Great Gargants, then the Warlord must be placed in eine of them. Otherwise the Warlord will join a Gargant oder Nobz unit.

rules.title: Heizakult Warlord
description: Every Speed Freaks army must include a Oberbefehlshaber called a Mekboy Bad Ork Biker. The Mekboy Bad Ork Biker unit is free; you don’t have to pay any Punkte für it. The Mekboy Bad Ork Biker unit may be added to any Ork formation in the army.

rules.title: Heizakult
description: Every unit in a Evil Sunz Heizakult army must either have a speed of 30cm plus, oder be transported in a unit mit einemspeed of 30cm plus. In other words, formations may not include units mit einemspeed of less than 30cm unless they also have a transport vehicle capable of carrying the unit around.

rules.title: Coordinated Fire
description: A formation that contains at least eine unit with Coordinated Fire can order bis zu zwei other un-broken formations within 15cm that have not taken an action this turn to follow their own formation when they take an Advance, Double oder Sustained Fire action.

Make a single Initiative roll für all foarmations, counting a single -1 modifier if any have Blast Markers. If the test is failed then the original formation (containing the unit calling für Coordinated Fire) receives a Blast Marker und must take a hold action. The other formations are unaffected (und may take an action later in the turn). If the test is passed then all formations concerned are allowed to take either an Advance, Double oder Sustained Fire action.

There is no obligation für all formations to take the same action, und these actions may be resolved in any order, but they must all fire at the same target formation. If the formation being activated is unable oder unwilling to fire at the selected formation, it cannot fire at all that turn. The formations don’t have to stay within a given distance of jeweils other und will complete their actions eine after the other. Jeweils formations action is declared und resolved (including testing to see if the target formation breaks) before moving on to the next Tau formation.

rules.title: Deflector Shield
description: Tau Deflector Shields work like an Unmodifizierter Rettungswurf in all respects, except it is 5+ instead of 6+. Against Titan Killer attacks, WE und H-AV must make eine Unmodifizierter Rettungswurf against jeweils point of damage.

rules.title: Guided Raketen
description: Guided Raketen may be fired without Line of Sight, but may only be fired at a targets that are Marked with Markerlights.

Guided Raketen follow all the normal suppression rules. If a unit mit einemGuided Rakete weapon is within range und Line of Sight to a unit in the target formation then it is counted für suppression purposes, even if the target formation is not Marked.
Guided Raketen counts as having Line of Sight to all units in a Marked formation für the purpose of suppression, Crossfire und when shooting as part of an Overwatch action.

rules.title: Markerlights
description: All enemy formations with at least eine unit within 30cm range und Line of Sight of at least eine Tau unit with the Markerlights special rule is considered to be Marked. When shooting at a Marked formation, all ranged Feuerkraft attacks gain einen zusätzlichen +1 modifier to their To-Hit roll. This bonus für shooting at a Marked enemy may not be used when making Anti-Aircraft attacks, oder with BP type attacks. A Tau formation that is broken oder has Marched this turn may not mark enemy formations.

rules.title: Tau Jet Packs
description: Tau Jet Packs follow all the rules für Sprungmodule. In addition, formations that exclusively consists of units with Tau Jet Packs are allowed to make an extra move of bis zu 10cm at the end of an Advance, Double oder March action. The extra move is allowed whether oder not the unit fires und takes place after any firing. This extra move may be in any direction und follows all the normal movement rules, so unit coherency und zones of control must be adhered to as usual.

rules.title: Tiger Shark Gun Drones
description: Transported Gun Drone formations may be split across multiple Tiger Sharks as an exception to the normal aircraft transport rules. The Tiger Sharks cannot land, Engage, oder embark units, but can disembark transported Gun Drones after an approach move. The Gun Drone formation may shoot when it disembarks as normal (see Transporting Ground Units), und counts as having activated für that turn. After this initial deployment the Gun Drones are a completely independent formation.

rules.title: Synapse
description: The following rules applies to Primary und Secondary Synapse Swarm formations only. Synapse creatures are any unit with the 'Synapse' special rule. A Synapse Swarm with no remaining Synapse creatures has an Initiative Rating of 3+ und may neither capture nor contest objectives, including They Shall Not Pass.

A Synapse Swarm with remaining Synapse creatures can absorb other Synapse Swarm formations with no remaining Synapse creatures at the end of its action. The formation must have eine unit within 5cm of a unit from the formation(s) being absorbed. The units und Blast Markers of an absorbed formation become part of the formation (broken formations are considered to have an equal number of Blast Markers as the number of remaining units/starting DC). An absorbed formation is considered completely destroyed für the purposes of tie-break und the Break Their Spirit objective.

rules.title: Hive Mind Locus
description: As long as the Tyranid army contains a unit with Hive Mind Locus it may re-roll a single failed Initiative test (of any type) once pro turn (unless all units with Hive Mind Locus are located offboard).

rules.title: Broodmind
description: All Genestealer Cult formations containing an Iconward, Magus, Primus, Patriarch, oder Broodlord receive a +1 modifier to their Action Test when carrying out an Engage action, und gain a +1 modifier when attempting to Rally.

rules.title: Genestealer Cult Characters
description: Genestealer Cult characters may only be added to units of INF that were not added to the formation as part of an upgrade.

rules.title: Hive Mind
description: All Tyranid formations receive a +1 modifier to their Action Test when carrying out an Engage action, und a +1 modifier to their Rally Tests.

rules.title: Shoot the Big Ones!
description: The enemies of the Tyranids have learned that destroying the Hive Mind's Synapse Creatures will cause Tyranid swarms to become disorganized. Für this reason certain units which normally would be Infanterie are instead Light Vehicles.

rules.title: Extreme Mobility
description: Tyranid AV und WE units do not take dangerous oder terrain tests. Tyranid LV units move through terrain und receive cover as if they were INF, und Tyranid INF does not need to take difficult terrain tests. Fortified positions such as Minefields, Razor Wire, und special terrain features affect Tyranids normally.

rules.title: Extreme Mobility (Genestealer Cult)
description: Acolyte Hybrids, Aberrants, Genestealers, und Metamorph Hybrids does not need to take terrain tests. Fortified positions such as Minefields, Razor Wire, und special terrain features affect these units normally.

rules.title: Gaunts
description: Half (rounding up) of Termagants, Hormagaunts, Gargoyles, und Raveners that are killed in an assault do not count für combat resolution und are Entbehrlich as long as there is at least eine model with Synapse still present in the formation.

rules.title: Dagon Vanguard Organisms
description: Only Genestealers, Lictors, und Nest Swarms may deploy as garrisons.

rules.title: Hydra Vanguard Organisms
description: Only Genestealers, Lictors, und Dimachaeron may deploy as garrisons.

rules.title: Swarm (x)
description: In the End Phase, before formations have rallied, all unbroken Tyranid formations with both Swarm (x) und Synapse creatures may 'Swarm'.

Für jeweils Swarm point, eine unit with the 'Gaunts' rule that has been lost during the battle may be added to the formation, but jeweils unit with 'Swarm (x)' may only bring back the types of units that are within brackets next to its 'Gaunt Pouch'.

All units returned to play in this manner must be placed within 5cm of a unit from the formation that was there prior to Swarming, und may not be placed in enemy zones of control oder impassable terrain. Not all generated Swarm Punkte need to be used, but may not be saved für future turns.

rules.title: General Tournament Tiebreaker Rules
description: If a player gives up the game, oder does not show up within 30 minutes it is scored as a Total Victory für the opponent. If a game must be abandoned before turn 4 because of lack of time, the current objective total determines the score, mit einem-4 penalty für both sides if the game ended prematurely in turn 2, und a -2 penalty für both sides if the game ended prematurely in turn 3. If eine player was late to the game start by more than 5 minutes, that player takes both player’s penalties.

rules.title: Brood Brothers
description: As long as a formation contains eine Genestealer Patriarch, Genestealer Primus, Genestealer Magus, oder Hybrid Iconward, units in in the same formation with the 'Brood Brothers' special rule do not cause Blast Markers when they are destroyed, oder when hit by a weapon with the 'Disrupt' special rule. This includes the extra Blast Marker from the first casualty of a crossfire und für units destroyed für being out of formation after a move. Units with 'Brood Brothers' that are killed in an assault count für the purposes of working out its result.

rules.title: Broodcoven
description: The army must include a Broodcoven formation. The enemy counts as having achieved the ‘Break Their Spirit’ (BTS) victory condition if they destroy this formation oder the most expensive formation in the army.

rules.title: Thousand Sons Characters
description: Thousand Sons characters may only be added to units of Chaos Space Marines, Rubric Marines, Scarab Occult Terminatoren, oder Sorcerer Disc Riders.

rules.title: Overlord Insertion
description: Some Primaris Space Marines are equipped with heavy Sprungmodule oder Gravschirme designed to be dropped from low orbit onto the battlefield from the assault bays of low-orbiting attack crafts. This ability is represented by the formation gaining the Self Planetfall special rule, with eine exception: Roll to scatter only für the first unit in the formation, then place the rest of the units within 5cm of the first unit.
